plugin.name: 换IP
plugin.cmd:
@echo off :start set/p num=请输入最后一段IP： if %num% LSS 221 goto bad if %num% GTR 230 goto bad @echo on netsh interface ip set address "Wi-Fi" static 219.218.22.%num% 255.255.255.0 219.218.22.1 netsh interface ip set dns "Wi-Fi" static 219.218.18.18 @echo off pause exit
:bad echo 请输入221-230之间的数。 goto start
